Latest Blog Posts

28 Nov

Employers Who Are “Lemons” Will Never Call You

Some employers and recruiters are real “lemons.” They don’t get back to you, they cancel appointments, they misrepresent the position in the job ad, and they ask dumb questions.read more

21 Nov

Are Online Assessments Killing Your Job Candidacy?

Employers are using online assessments as a pre-screening mechanism. Assessments can ask job candidates many more questions than could be asked by either phone or in-person interviews. read more

15 Nov

Why You Are Still Unemployed?

How long have you been looking for a job? In the past, job search campaigns were defined in days or weeks. But recent employment statistics allege that people are now remaining unemployed for many months before they are re-hired.read more
